idea-plugin.name: VS Code Keymap
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• Add ShowUsages shortcut
  • Add EditorUnindentSelection shortcut
  • Add EditorIndentSelection shortcut
  • Add EditorChooseLookupItemReplace shortcut
  • Add BraceOrQuoteOut shortcut
  • Fixes for FileChooser.NewFile shortcut
  • Add NextTemplateParameter and NextParameter shortcuts
  • Add SE shortcuts "NextTab" and "CompleteCommand"
  • Delete Find Usages shortcut (shift alt f12) because there's no similar shortcut in VS Code
idea-plugin.description: VS Code Keymap for IntelliJ-based IDEs: IntelliJ IDEA, WebStorm, PhpStorm, and others
